blogs.title: Understanding React Hooks
blogs.author: Jane Doe
blogs.content: React Hooks are functions that let you use state and other React features without writing a class.

blogs.title: Node.js Best Practices
blogs.author: John Smith
blogs.content: Writing clean and efficient Node.js code involves following some best practices such as using async/await, modularizing code, and handling errors gracefully.

blogs.title: Introduction to Zustand
blogs.author: Emily Turner
blogs.content: Zustand is a small, fast and scalable bearbones state-management solution using simplified flux principles.

blogs.title: Deploying with Vercel
blogs.author: Michael Lee
blogs.content: Vercel provides a seamless way to deploy frontend apps with minimal configuration.
